title: Will I get notified if my asset goes on sale?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have sent in a sales request form
  • I want to know how I will find out about the sale

sections.title: Cause
content: If you have submitted a request to be included in a sale here.

It may be some time before you hear back from the Review Team with the results. This is because we receive many requests and want to ensure that the best possible assets get included in our promotions and sales.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If the Review Team select your asset to be part of a sale or deal, they will send an email to the address attached to your Publisher account.
This will let you know when your asset will go on sale and the type of promotion it will be part of.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please see our Sale page for the current promotions.
